message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, and I know you'd benefit greatly from it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $14,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $13,000.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand where you're coming from, but I'm looking for something closer to $13,750. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
